alert.note: Alert for Culebra; North Central; Vieques (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued September 16 at 6:40AM ADT until September 16 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat indices of 112 degrees or more. * WHERE...North-central Puerto Rico, Vieques and Culebra. * WHEN...From 10 AM AST until 5 PM AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion likely. Heat stroke with prolonged exposure.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
